name: Sensory Leakage
description:
NOTE: This is a demo of the first half or so of the game only. I decided to go ahead and release at least part of the game for the jam instead of giving up.

Rosaria is a former teen E.S.P.er trying to adjust to the adult world, where it turns out that shooting energy balls is not actually that useful. One evening, she hits it off with an introverted bookworm, Karen, and slowly starts a relationship with her. Maybe things are starting to look up.

But a mysterious theft haunts their town, and Karen has secrets of her own...

  • Supports multiple resolutions (1920x1080, 1280x720, 1200x600, and 800x600)
  • Retro graphics and sound
  • PC-98 style frame instead of weird big images that take up the whole screen
  • Released under a free culture license -- copy, sell, share, and remix!

Content warnings: Bad language, near-drowning, one pixellated but still classically nude lady (nothing you wouldn't see in art history class).
